New Records: Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal equalled the record for the second highest opening alliance for India in T20Is, making 165 runs against West Indies.
Key Match Events: Yashasvi Jaiswal scored 84 not out off 51 balls
Pre-Game Insights: There were apprehensions of pitch getting slowed down in the second half of the match.
Post-Match Reflections: India levelled the five-match series 2-2 with the victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The centre square that was recently refurbished using the Mississippi soil stayed true for the whole course of the match.
Others: Shimron Hetmyer scored 61 for West Indies
Shai Hope scored 45 for West Indies
